      • bindResponses

        public static MatrixBlock bindResponses(List<org.apache.commons.lang3.tuple.Pair<FederatedRange,Future<FederatedResponse>>> readResponses,
                                        long[] dims)
                                 throws Exception
        Bind data from federated workers based on non-overlapping federated ranges.
        Parameters:
        readResponses - responses from federated workers containing the federated ranges and data
        dims - dimensions of output MatrixBlock
        Returns:
        MatrixBlock of consolidated data
        Throws:
        Exception - in case of problems with getting data from responses

      • aggregateResponses

        public static MatrixBlock aggregateResponses(List<org.apache.commons.lang3.tuple.Pair<FederatedRange,Future<FederatedResponse>>> readResponses)
        Aggregate partially aggregated data from federated workers by adding values with the same index in different federated locations.
        Parameters:
        readResponses - responses from federated workers containing the federated data
        Returns:
        MatrixBlock of consolidated, aggregated data
